_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Form is breakable, but its cessation, settling, and ending is unbreakable.
Feeling is breakable, but its cessation, settling, and ending is unbreakable.
Perception is breakable, but its cessation, settling, and ending is unbreakable.
Choices are breakable, but their cessation, settling, and ending is unbreakable.
Consciousness is breakable, but its cessation, settling, and ending is unbreakable.
